text: The Sneppen Bridge () is a bridge that crosses the river Steinkjerelva in the town of Steinkjer in the municipality of Steinkjer in Trøndelag county, Norway. The long concrete bridge was completed in 1987 and carries the European route E6 highway. The bridge was officially opened on 5 August 1987 by the mayor Erik Bartnes. ==See also== *List of bridges in Norway *List of bridges in Norway by length *List of bridges *List of bridges by length ==References== Category:Road bridges in Trøndelag Category:European Route E6 in Norway Category:Steinkjer Category:Bridges completed in 1987 Category:1987 establishments in Norway
title: Sneppen Bridge
